Package base_SOM_Objects.som_geom.geom_examples

Class SOM_GeomObj

java.lang.Object
base_SOM_Objects.som_examples.base.baseDataPtVis
base_SOM_Objects.som_examples.SOM_Example
base_SOM_Objects.som_geom.geom_examples.SOM_GeomObj
Direct Known Subclasses:
Geom_PlaneSOMExample, Geom_SphereSOMExample, SOM_GeomLineObj
public abstract class SOM_GeomObj extends SOM_Example
class to instance the base functionality of a geometric object represented by some parameters and also by samples for use in training and consuming a SOM
Author:
john

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    final void
    buildCompFtrVector(float _ignored)
    this will build the comparison feature vector array that is used as the comparison vector in distance measurements - for most cases this will just be a copy of the ftr vector array but in some instances, there might be an alternate vector to be used to handle when, for example, an example has ftrs that do not appear on the map

  • Constructor Details

    • SOM_GeomObj

      public SOM_GeomObj(SOM_GeomMapManager _mapMgr, SOM_ExDataType _exType, String _id, SOM_GeomSamplePointf[] _srcSmpls, SOM_GeomObjTypes _GeoType, int _numSmplPts, boolean _is3D, boolean _shouldBuildSamples, boolean _shouldBuildVisRep)
      build a geometry-based training/validation example for the SOM
      Parameters:
      _mapMgr - : owning map manager
      _exType - : example data type (ML) (training, testing, validation, etc)
      _id - : the unique ID info for this training example
      _srcSmpls - : the source points and their owning SOM_GeomObj objects that built this sample (if null then these are the points that make this object)
      _worldBounds - : bounds in world for valid values for this object
      _GeoType - : geometric object type
      _numSmplPts - : # of sample points to build for this object

    • SOM_GeomObj

      public SOM_GeomObj(SOM_GeomMapManager _mapMgr, SOM_ExDataType _exType, String _oid, String _csvDat, SOM_GeomObjTypes _GeoType, int _numSrcPts, boolean _is3D)

    • buildCompFtrVector

      public final void buildCompFtrVector(float _ignored)
      this will build the comparison feature vector array that is used as the comparison vector in distance measurements - for most cases this will just be a copy of the ftr vector array but in some instances, there might be an alternate vector to be used to handle when, for example, an example has ftrs that do not appear on the map
      Specified by:
      buildCompFtrVector in class SOM_Example
      Parameters:
      _ignored - : ignored this is ignored for this kind of example
